src_original: maheśvaravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  nārāyaṇavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ nārāyaṇarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  brahmavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ brahmarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
indravaineyānāṃ sattvānāmindrarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  ādityavaineyānāṃ sattvānāmādityarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  candravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ candrarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /

agnivaineyānāṃ sattvānāmagnirūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  varuṇavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ varuṇarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  vāyuvaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vāyurūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  nāgavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ nāgarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
vighnapativaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vighnapatirūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  yakṣavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ yakṣarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
